title: How to Clean Your Bedroom (Tweens)

steps.headline: Turn on some upbeat music to get you motivated to clean your room.
Make your bed.
steps.description: Just seeing how nice a made bed looks encourages you to clean the rest of your bedroom.

steps.headline: Pick up all of the clothes that are on the floor and put them on the bed.
steps.description: Fold any clean ones and put them away. Any dirty ones put in the hamper.

steps.headline: Pick up your shoes off the floor and put them away in the closet.
steps.description: Maybe to help organize it buy a shoe organizer. They are lifesavers.

steps.headline: Pick anything else up off the floor and put them in the correct spot neatly .
Pick up the trash and throw it away
Clean your floor with a vacuum or sweeper to get any dirt off the floor.
Organize anything unorganized in the bedroom to give it a more clean feeling
Take the dirty clothes in the hamper to laundry room and throw them in the wash.

text: Turn on some upbeat music to get you motivated to clean your room.  Make your bed. Just seeing how nice a made bed looks encourages you to clean the rest of your bedroom. Pick up all of the clothes that are on the floor and put them on the bed. Fold any clean ones and put them away. Any dirty ones put in the hamper. Pick up your shoes off the floor and put them away in the closet. Maybe to help organize it buy a shoe organizer. They are lifesavers. Pick anything else up off the floor and put them in the correct spot neatly .  Pick up the trash and throw it away  Clean your floor with a vacuum or sweeper to get any dirt off the floor.  Organize anything unorganized in the bedroom to give it a more clean feeling  Take the dirty clothes in the hamper to laundry room and throw them in the wash.  Take out the trash.
